meanings.sent1: The wood was drillable, so we easily made a hole in it.
meanings.sent2: The metal was too hard to be drillable, so we had to find a different way to cut it.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so soft and drillable that it crumbled at the slightest touch.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a drillable surface, ready to absorb new information effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The snow was drillable, allowing us to build a snowman with ease.

meanings.sent1: The drillable material was perfect for our project.
meanings.sent2: We needed a drillable surface to work on, so we chose the wooden plank.
meanings.sent3: The drillable rock looked like it was begging to be drilled into.
meanings.sent4: The drillable ground welcomed the construction workers with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The drillable metal sheet gleamed under the sunlight, ready to be worked on.

meanings.sent1: The lock was drillable, making it easy for the locksmith to open it.
meanings.sent2: The drillable surface allowed us to create precise holes for the screws.
meanings.sent3: The drillable wall seemed to mock us as we struggled to make a hole in it.
meanings.sent4: His patience was as drillable as a diamond, enduring any challenge that came his way.
meanings.sent5: The drillable material yielded effortlessly to the power of the drill, showing its true nature.
